p: It is important to emphasize that some VOCs frequently isolated in the other common Citrus species were not found in C. junos peel, such as geranial, isolated in the peel of all the other nine Citrus species, terpenyl acetate, neryl acetate, eucalyptol (also missing in C. medica peel), tetradecanal, Î²-bisabolene or decyl acetate (the latter two compounds found in the juice but not in the peel of C. junos) ( Tomiyama et al., 2012).
